body.name: Oral-B Pro-Health Junior CrossAction Galaxy Toothbrush, Ages 6+, Soft - Pack of 6
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Power Tip combines with perfectly angled CROSSACTION bristles for great reach and clean
Handle sized for comfort and control
Assorted in four colors: Pink, Green, Blue, Purple (Toothbrush colors are subject to change)
body.description: The Oral-B Kids Galaxy 6+ toothbrush has soft, perfectly angled CrossAction bristles that clean between the gaps in kids' changing teeth (like teeth with braces) and remove plaque in hard-to-reach areas. Textured tongue cleaner removes odor-causing particles. Smaller brush handle designed to fit easily in kids' hands. Oral-B is the #1 recommended toothbrush brand by dentists worldwide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I love these toothbrushes. They’re the right size and texture and are easy to hold. I don’t know what else to say about them because they are toothbrushes so there’s not that many features to discuss

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Oral-B Pro-Health Junior CrossAction Galaxy Toothbrush is an absolute game-changer for young dental care. As a parent, I can't help but rave about this toothbrush. The pack of 6 is a fantastic value for money, and here's why this toothbrush deserves all the stars in the galaxy:1. **Kid-Friendly Design:** The toothbrush features a captivating galaxy-themed design that instantly appeals to children. Brushing time turns into an adventure through the cosmos, making it fun and engaging.2. **Soft Bristles:** The gentle, soft bristles are perfect for young teeth and gums. No more worries about discomfort during brushing; these bristles are as gentle as a breeze.3. **CrossAction Technology:** The innovative CrossAction bristle layout ensures a thorough and effective clean. It easily reaches every nook and cranny in your child's mouth, promoting optimal oral health.4. **Ages 6+:** Designed for children aged 6 and older, this toothbrush is the perfect transition from a kids' toothbrush to an adult one. It helps instill good oral hygiene habits from a young age.5. **Pack of 6:** Having six toothbrushes in one pack is incredibly convenient for families with multiple children. You won't have to keep repurchasing toothbrushes frequently, saving time and money.6. **Oral-B Quality:** Oral-B is a trusted brand in dental care, known for its quality and innovation. With the Pro-Health Junior CrossAction Galaxy Toothbrush, they've maintained their high standards.7. **Dentist-Recommended:** This toothbrush comes highly recommended by dentists, which offers peace of mind for parents.8. **Long-Lasting:** The durability of these toothbrushes is impressive. They'll last a good while, making them a wise investment.In summary, the Oral-B Pro-Health Junior CrossAction Galaxy Toothbrush is a fantastic choice for kids aged 6 and up. It's not just a toothbrush; it's a dental journey through the galaxy that your child will eagerly embark on. With its quality, value, and engaging design, this toothbrush truly shines like a star in the oral care universe! Your child's smile will thank you for it.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a 3 pack
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old really likes these, he typically complains about the bristle strength but these seem to be perfect and soft, yet durable where they aren't falling apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The size of these toothbrushes is great. The bristles however are too soft. They don't clean our children's teeth as well as I would like for them to. Therefore, they will remain as backups.

reviews.reviewText: Adorable we also have the matching tooth paste that changes colors !

reviews.reviewText: Love this bulk pack for my 7 and 10yr old! Good quality and it’s always nice to have the extra on hand for when it’s time to change to a new one or needing a new one after an illness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for my 6 & 8 year old grandkids. Great brush head size

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran hallazgo para la transición - Oral-B Pro-Health Junior CrossAction Galaxy
reviews.reviewText: Descubrir los cepillos de dientes Oral-B Pro-Health Junior ha sido una solución excelente para un problema recurrente en México: la falta de cepillos de tamaño intermedio. Estos cepillos son perfectos para niños mayores de 6 años que han superado la etapa de los cepillos infantiles pero que aún no están listos para los de adulto. A pesar de su precio elevado debido a la importación por un tercero, valen la pena por su tamaño y diseño adecuados. Sería ideal que Oral-B considerara distribuir estos cepillos directamente en México para facilitar el acceso a un producto tan necesario. Mientras tanto, son altamente recomendables para padres que buscan la opción correcta para sus hijos en transición.

No encontraba en mi país estos cepillos +6 parecían descontinuados. Son un poquito más grandes que los que la marca distribuye en México, pero todo ok funcionan. Súper bien empacados, protegidos.Vienen en los colores que se exhiben, dos rosas, verdes y azules.
